# API Calls

Explore the API here hands-on
This API supports a data response in JSON format
Need a little help? Read our getting started to learn about using this API

# POST /voucher/store

HEAD PARAMS DESCRIPTION
Authorization Unique Key Provided by CARDLESS (e.g Bearer NIBBS_********)
BODY PARAMS DESCRIPTION
voucher_code The voucher code sent to the user
Required*
customer_email Email of the customer who requested the voucher
Required*
phonenumber Phone number of the customer who requested the voucher
Required*
name Name of the customer who requested the voucher
Required*
amount Amount value of the voucher
Required*
createdAt Time at which voucher was created

# 200 success

{
   status: true,
   message: "Voucher Saved Successfully",
   data: {
       "amount": 5000,
       "createdAt": 2019-07-15t02:54:48728z,
       "voucher_code": "190xxxxxxxx",
       'customer': {
           "email": "richardgriffon@example.com",
           "name": "richard griffon"
       }  
}

# 400 failure

{
   status: false,
   message: error
}

# PUT /voucher/use

HEAD PARAMS DESCRIPTION
Authorization Unique Key Provided by CARDLESS (e.g Bearer NAFTAPOS********)
BODY PARAMS DESCRIPTION
voucher_code The voucher code sent to the user
Required*
amount Amount value of the voucher
Required*

# 200 success

{
   status: true,
   message: "Voucher payment transacted successfully",
   data: {
       "amount": 5000,
       "createdAt": 2019-07-15t02:54:48728z,
       "voucher_code": "190xxxxxxxx",
       'customer': {
           "email": "richardgriffon@example.com",
           "name": "richard griffon"
       }  
}

# 400 failure

{
   status: false,
   message: error
}
